    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">

          <title>
            <string language="sl">Sistem masa-vzmet (2)</string>
            <string language="en">Mass-spring system (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Masse-Frühling System (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">système de Masse-ressort (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sistema da Massa-mola (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">sistema della Massa-molla (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σύστημα μάζα-ελατηρίων (2)</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">sistema del Masa-resorte (2)</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Vzbujanje in resonanca sistema masa-vzmet s pomočjo spremenljive zunanje sile, enačba za amplitudo takega harmoničnega nihala.</string>
            <string language="en">Resonance of mass-spring system due to the external force and equation for amplitude of such setup.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">harmonično nihalo</string>
            <string language="en">harmonic pendulum</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">resonanca</string>
            <string language="en">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">amplituda</string>
            <string language="en">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">colos</string>
            <string language="en">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resonanz des Masse-Frühling Systems wegen der 
externen Kraft und der Gleichung für Umfang solcher Installation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Résonance de système de masse-ressort due à la 
force et à l'équation externes pour l'amplitude d'une telle 
installation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Resonance do sistema da massa-mola  devido à 
força e à equação externas para a amplitude de tal instalação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Risonanza del sistema della massa-molla dovuto la 
forza e l'equazione esterne per ampiezza di tale messa a punto.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αντήχηση του συστήματος μάζα-ελατηρίων λόγω στην 
εξωτερικές δύναμη και την εξίσωση για το εύρος τέτοιας 
οργάνωσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Resonancia del sistema del masa-resorte  debido a 
la fuerza y a la ecuación externas para la amplitud de tal 
disposición.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">harmonisches Pendel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Resonanz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Umfang</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">pendule harmonique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">résonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">colos</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">pêndulo harmonic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">resonance</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">amplitude</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">colos</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
